actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend section 627 of the Tariff Act of 1930 to require customs officers to verify the identification numbers of vehicles before the vehicles are exported.
short_title: Motor Vehicle Theft Law Enforcement Improvement Act of 1989

summary.text: Motor Vehicle Theft Law Enforcement Improvement Act of 1989 - Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 (as amended by the Motor Vehicle Theft Law Enforcement Act of 1984) and the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 to require customs officers to verify the identification numbers of certain vehicles with the National Computer Information Center before such vehicles are exported for purposes of determining if an unlawful importation or exportation has occurred.

titles.title: Motor Vehicle Theft Law Enforcement Improvement Act of 1989
To amend section 627 of the Tariff Act of 1930 to require customs officers to verify the identification numbers of vehicles before the vehicles are exported.
